ProjectsArray.Title: Sacred Hound Designs
ProjectsArray.FeatureOne: Utilized JSON Web Tokens and localStorage to store encrypted user information client-side.
ProjectsArray.FeatureTwo: Built a full stack Django app using the batteries included features for admin and authentication.
ProjectsArray.FeatureThree: Deployed with Heroku and a Bit.io database to hold product information.
ProjectsArray.FeatureFour: Employed Materialize and custom CSS to style templates for a clean, modern look.

ProjectsArray.Title: Portfolio Blog In Vue.js
ProjectsArray.FeatureOne: Independent from Instructional team, I learned how to build a blog style portfolio app in a brand new tech in 3 days.
ProjectsArray.FeatureTwo: Deployed an AWS server less back end with a DynamoDB database to hold project information.
ProjectsArray.FeatureThree: Built an input form that allows portfolio owner to add new, edit and delete projects.
ProjectsArray.FeatureFour: Utilized Lambda Function and HTTP API to allow project information to be dynamically displayed upon request.

ProjectsArray.Title: Dad Jokes All Day
ProjectsArray.FeatureOne: API call using Ajax to a third party resource to display data.
ProjectsArray.FeatureTwo: Used jQuery to select HTML id tags for DOM manipulation.
ProjectsArray.FeatureThree: Built out two event listeners, one for the setup and the second for the punchline.
ProjectsArray.FeatureFour: Refactored third party RapidAPI documentation to fit project needs.

ProjectsArray.Title: CheeZus
ProjectsArray.FeatureOne: Collaborated with a team of four to brainstorm project idea, split tasks, and sprint to achieve deadline.
ProjectsArray.FeatureTwo: Built out an Express API with full CRUD functionality.
ProjectsArray.FeatureThree: Constructed a React front end with Async fetch requests to access MongoDB database.
ProjectsArray.FeatureFour: Generated custom images for CSS animation.

ProjectsArray.Title: Fitz-List
ProjectsArray.FeatureOne: Express Full Stack app using EJS templates.
ProjectsArray.FeatureTwo: Full CRUD for signed in Users to create profiles and job postings.
ProjectsArray.FeatureThree: MongoDB connection to store User data.
ProjectsArray.FeatureFour: Express Sessions Authentication with protected routes.
